title: Jus Alpukat (Indonesian Avocado-Coffee Shake) Recipe
full_text:
Jus Alpukat (Indonesian Avocado-Coffee Shake) Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
2
to 4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
cup
(
240
ml
)
whole milk
, plus more as needed
1/2
cup
(
120
ml
)
sweetened condensed milk
2
medium
Hass avocados
(about
8
ounces
/
225
g
each), halved, pitted, and flesh scooped
10
ounces
(
285
g
)
ice
(about
10
ice
cubes
)
1/4
cup
(
60
ml
)
strongly brewed coffee
(such as a
double espresso shot
)
Pinch
kosher
or
sea salt
Chocolate syrup
, for drizzling (optional)
Directions
In a blender, combine whole milk, sweetened condensed milk, avocado, ice, coffee, and salt. Blend on high speed until smooth, 30 seconds to 1 minute; if the shake is thicker than you'd like, blend in more milk to thin slightly.
If desired, drizzle chocolate syrup on inside of serving glasses, then divide shake evenly between glasses, and serve.
Special Equipment
Blender
Notes
This shake is also delicious without the coffee.
Make-Ahead and Storage
The shake should be made right before serving.
Southeast Asian
Indonesian
Avocado
Coffee
